name: हम्बल एडमिनिस्ट्रेटर्स गार्डन
address: यह नंबर 178, डोंगबेई स्ट्रीट, गुसु जिला, सूज़ौ सिटी
features: a UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of China's Four Famous Gardens.

name: सूज़ौ संग्रहालय
address: नंबर 204, डोंग बेई स्ट्रीट, गुसू जिला, सूज़ौ
features: The new and exquisitely elegant museum building of the Suzhou Museum designed by Ieoh Ming Pei is worth visiting and you can also enjoy the treasured Olive Green Lotus-Shaped Bowl.

name: झोउझुआंग टाउन
address: नंबर 43, क्वानफू रोड, झोउझुआंग टाउन, कुनशान सिटी, सूज़ौ सिटी
features: It's famous for its many small bridges and winding waterways, the Twin Bridges, and the traditional Chinese riverboats. You can also walk in the footsteps of Shen Wansan.

name: हुकियू दर्शनीय क्षेत्र
address: नंबर 8, शानमेनेई, हुकियू जिला, सूज़ौ शहर
features: You can enjoy the beautiful scenery of mountains and Jiangnan gardens, learn more about the Spring and Autumn Period and visit the leaning Huqiu Pagoda.

name: लायन फारेस्ट गार्डन
address: नंबर 23, युआनलिन रोड, गुसू जिला, सूज़ौ शहर
features: one of Suzhou's Four Famous Gardens, best known for its rock garden. When you're there you can count the stone lions and walk through the rock maze. There are loads of things to do.

name: हंसन मंदिर
address: नंबर 24, हंसन मंदिर लेन, गुसू जिला, सूज़ौ शहर
features: This famous thousand-year temple is also the one in the poem "Beyond the Gusu District, from the Hanshan Temple". Tourists often strike the bell in the temple and pray for blessings.

name: सुस्त गार्डन
address: No. 338, Liuyuan Road, Changmenwai, Gusu District, Suzhou City
features: In the Suzhou-styled garden with humbleness, there are three treasures: Guanyun Peak, Nanmu Hall, and fish fossils.

name: तोंगली टाउन
address: टोंगली प्राचीन शहर, वुजियांग जिला, सूज़ौ शहर
features: पांच झीलों से घिरा एक जियांगन जल शहर है। आप तीन पुलों को पार कर सकते हैं और उत्तम रिट्रीट एंड रिफ्लेक्शन गार्डन

name: शांतांग स्ट्रीट
address: गुसु ओल्ड टाउन, गुसू जिला, सूज़ौ सिटी के उत्तर-पश्चिम कोने पर
features: You can enjoy the scenery of old Suzhou, visit the old guild hall and other historical sites, take a cruise on the river and take photos of the beautiful night scenery.

name: तियानपिंग माउंटेन दर्शनीय क्षेत्र
address: लिंग्टियन रोड, वुझोंग जिला, सूज़ौ शहर
features: It's the burial place of the ancestors of Fan Zhongyan and it's great fun climbing on the rocky roads in the area. Besides, in mid-to-late November, you can view the beautiful enjoy red maple trees there.

name: पिंगजियांग रोड
address: नंबर 65, बैता ईस्ट रोड, गुसू जिला, सूज़ौ सिटी, जियांग्सू प्रांत
features: Walk around the well-preserved ancient blocks, watch the bridges and flowing water, visit the literary and artistic shops, and eat delicious food.

name: जिनजी झील दर्शनीय क्षेत्र
address: 158, जिंगगैंग स्ट्रीट, सूज़ौ इंडस्ट्रियल पार्क, सूज़ौ सिटी
features: get a good view of tall buildings like the Gate of the Orient, ride the Ferris wheel, take a night cruise, and feel the modern side of Suzhou.

name: गुआनकियान स्ट्रीट
address: Guanqian Street, Gusu District, Suzhou City.
features: You can try food from time-honored Suzhou brands, such as Songhelou Restaurant, Huang Tianyuan, and visit Xuanmiao Temple, the place that gave the street its name.

name: मुडू टाउन
address: नंबर 188, शांतांग स्ट्रीट, मुडु टाउन, वुज़ोंग जिला, सूज़ौ शहर
features: a water town featuring gardens. You can visit classical gardens such as Yanjia Garden, go on a boat ride and enjoy the flowing water.

name: Panmen Scenic Area
address: No. 49, Dongda Street, Gusu District, Suzhou City, Jiangsu Province
features: Climb or take a boat to visit the only water and land city gate in China — Pan Gate. Walk across the Wumen Bridge and visit the Ruiguang Tower.

name: शाजियाबांग दर्शनीय स्थल
address: शाजियाबांग टाउन, चांगशु, सूज़ौ सिटी
features: the birthplace of the revolutionary Peking opera "Shajiabang". There you can visit the scene from the opera and take a boat amid reed marshes.

name: नेट्स गार्डन के मास्टर
address: नंबर 11 कुओजियाटो एली, दाइचेंगकियाओ रोड, गुसु जिला, सूज़ौ
features: It is a famous fine garden with traditional opera performances at night.

name: शिशान माउंटेन
address: नंबर 158, लिनवू रोड, जिनटिंग टाउन, वुझोंग जिला, सूज़ौ
features: Xishan Mountain is the biggest island in Taihu Lake. From the island, you can get a great view of the misty lake.

name: कियोंग्लोंग पर्वतीय दर्शनीय क्षेत्र
address: कियोंग्लोंग माउंटेन दर्शनीय क्षेत्र , जो ज़ांग्शू टाउन, वुझोंग जिला, सूज़ौ सिटी से एक किमी दक्षिण-पश्चिम
features: सूज़ौ में सबसे ऊंचे पर्वत पर चढ़ सकते हैं, जंगल की ताजी हवा का आनंद ले सकते हैं और सन त्ज़ू और ऐतिहासिक व्यक्तियों के नक्शेकदम का पता लगा सकते हैं

name: कैंगलांग मंडप
address: नंबर 3, कैंगलांग मंडप स्ट्रीट, रेनमिन रोड, गुसू जिला, सूज़ौ सिटी
features: one of the oldest gardens in Suzhou. It's very quiet and the lattice windows on the walls of the two-way corridor are very beautiful.

name: लुझी प्राचीन टाउन
address: नंबर 21, ज़ियाओशी रोड, लुझी टाउन, वुझोंग जिला, सूज़ौ सिटी
features: Luzhi Ancient Town has a history of over 2,500 years. The crossing waterways and the many bridges have earned it the titles of the "Pearl of the Five Lakes" and the "Thoroughfare of the Six Ponds".

name: कियांडेंग टाउन
address: नंबर 1, शांगशु रोड, कियांडेंग टाउन, कुनशान सिटी, सूज़ौ सिटी
features: Qiandeng Town has a history of more than 2500 years. You can enjoy its traditional buildings with white walls and black-tiled roofs and splendid scenery.

name: लिंग्यान माउंटेन दर्शनीय क्षेत्र
address: शांतांग स्ट्रीट, मुडू प्राचीन टाउन, वुझोंग जिला, सूज़ौ सिटी के अंत में है
features: It is a good place to climb the mountain. At the top, we can overlook the scenery of Suzhou City, worship Buddha, and pray for blessings in Lingyan Mountain Temple.

name: एस्लाइट बुकस्टोर
address: 2-3 एफ, नंबर 8, यूलांग स्ट्रीट, इंडस्ट्रियल पार्क, वुझोंग जिला, सूज़ौ सिटी
features: What is special about Eslite Bookstore is that it integrates stationery, drink and food, and entertainment all in one building.

name: सूज़ौ ताइहू लेक वेटलैंड पार्क
address: नंबर 1, टाउन लेक एम्ब्रॉयडरी स्ट्रीट, सूज़ौ न्यू डिस्ट्रिक्ट, सूज़ौ सिटी
features: The wetland park integrates tourism, entertainment, leisure, and education all in one. You could say it's a "paradise on earth".

name: सूचो विश्वविद्यालय
address: नंबर 1, शिज़ी स्ट्रीट, गुसु जिला, सूज़ौ सिटी
features: Soochow University is located in the old town of Suzhou and is part of the national "211 Project". Its predecessor was the original Soochow University founded in 1900.

name: शियान जियाओतोंग-लिवरपूल विश्वविद्यालय
address: नंबर 111, रेनाई रोड, दुशु लेक हायर एजुकेशन टाउन, सूज़ौ इंडस्ट्रियल पार्क, सूज़ौ सिटी
features: It is a university jointly established by Xi'an Jiaotong University and the University of Liverpool.

name: डोंगटिंग डोंगशान
address: Near Moli Road, Wuzhong District, Suzhou City
features: हुआनशान रोड, एक जेड बेल्ट की तरह, आगंतुकों को ताइहू झील और सड़क के साथ उत्तम प्राचीन इमारतों का आनंद लेने में सक्षम बनाता है और वे ताइहू झील की सफेद मछली, सिल्वरफिश और सफेद झींगा का स्वाद ले सकते हैं।

name: सूज़ौ सेंटर
address: 150 meters west of the intersection of Xingzhou Street and Xinggang Street, Suzhou Industrial Park
features: It is the biggest shopping mall in Suzhou. It is located just beside Jinji Lake and quite near the Gate of the Orient.

name: सूज़ौ मनोरंजन भूमि वन और जल दुनिया
address: the east of Yanghan East Road and the west of Shanshenwan Road, Suzhou New District, Suzhou City
features: forest-themed. It is like being in a vast forest close to the ocean.

name: हुआई ब्रदर्स मूवी वर्ल्ड
address: नंबर 188, यांगचेंघु एवेन्यू, सूज़ौ इंडस्ट्रियल पार्क, सूज़ौ सिटी
features: Based on the seven movies of the Huayi Brothers, the amusement park has invited famous movie artists to make groundbreaking designs to reproduce scenes from movies for visitors.

name: सूज़ौ एक्वेरियम
address: नंबर 28, हुआन ताइहू एवेन्यू, सूज़ौ ताइहू राष्ट्रीय पर्यटन अवकाश क्षेत्र
features: विभिन्न प्रकार के समुद्री जीवों का आनंद ले सकते हैं, अद्भुत जानवरों के प्रदर्शन देख सकते हैं, और रंगीन महासागर की दुनिया का अनुभव कर सकते हैं

name: जिंक्सी प्राचीन शहर
address: नंबर 18, शौदियांगांग रोड, जिंक्सी टाउन, कुनशान सिटी, सूज़ौ सिटी
features: Jinxi Ancient Town is in the southern suburbs of Kunshan by Dianshanhu Lake. It's a Jiangnan water town with a history of more than a thousand years.

name: शिलू पैदल मार्ग
address: शिलू पैदल यात्री स्ट्रीट, जिनचांग जिला, सूज़ौ शहर
features: The Stone Road was built during the Westernization Movement in the late Qing. The road is paved with stones, thereof the name "Stone Road". Here you'll find many famous stores with a long history.

name: हार्मनी टाइम्स स्क्वायर
address: No. 268, Wangdun Road, Suzhou Industrial Park
features: Yuanrong Times Square is a large-scale, comprehensive, modern, and high-quality commercial complex integrating shopping, catering, leisure, entertainment, business, culture, tourism, and other functions.

name: इंप्रेशन सिटी शॉपिंग सेंटर
address: No. 1699 Modern Avenue, Suzhou Industrial Park, Suzhou City, Jiangsu Province.
features: Impression City Shopping Center is a great place to shop, eat, or watch a movie. You can also various brands in the mall.

name: स्टोन लेक
address: No. 333, Youxin Road, Wuzhong District, Suzhou City.
features: It's famous for Stone Lake's wonderful scenery and the endless rows of mountains and ridges. It's a great place to appreciate the mountain and water culture of Suzhou.

name: गेट ऑफ द ओरिएंट
address: सूया रोड, सूज़ौ इंडस्ट्रियल पार्क, सूज़ौ
features: The Gate of the Orient, also commonly known as "long johns" because of its shape, has become a popular new landmark in Suzhou. It is located at the east end of the CBD axis of Suzhou Industrial Park.

name: दुशु लेक चर्च
address: नंबर 99, कुइवेई रोड, सूज़ौ सिटी
features: Dushu Lake Church is located by the beautiful Dushu Lake in Suzhou Industrial Park and that's where the spot gets its name. Plus, the church was built in the Gothic architectural style.

name: बैमाजियन इकोलॉजिकल पार्क
address: हुआशान रोड, फेंगकियाओ उप-जिला, सूज़ौ न्यू डिस्ट्रिक्ट, सूज़ौ सिटी
features: It was once an imperial path passed by Emperor Qianlong when he visited the south of the Yangtze River for the sixth time and there was a palace site. It was once a place where King Goujian of Yue endured hardships for nine years and raised horses for King Wu.
